title: GR, RW meeting presently underway
body_lines: A meeting between UNP Leader Ranil Wickremesinghe and President Gotabaya Rajapaksa is presently underway, just an hour before the President will address the nation.
Source told Daily Mirror that it is likely that President Rajapaksa will offer the premiership to Wickremesinghe. However it is yet to be known if Wickremesinghe will accept it. (Jamila Husain)
